title: So ranked 3v3s flex q!
body: How popular do you think this could get? I think a lot of people are going to get into this. Don't get me wrong I love 5v5. It is definitely funner than 3v3, but 3v3 offers an environment where you are less dependent on teammates and also the novelty of a different map/objectives etc.... Think we could see a world championship tournament in this environment?

replies.body: Easiest way to climb in rank is 3v3 with 3 mates. Op comp, less people to play at the same time, some champion are OP in 3v3, cause of the map (nocturn ult for example).
I hope so! I plan on playing a great deal of it once the semester is over.
